name: Captain Cloud
tagline: A cloud task manager that takes care of everything
body: Irrespective of all the creative work we do everyday, there are few things we need to do over and over again! It's boring, yet, necessary. It feels so worthless to be spending time on those. What are computers for? It's designed for the exact same purpose, here we are putting it into use.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
